title: Textile, ca. 1780
medium: Block print on cotton plain weave.
dimensions:
Warp: 70 cm (27 1/2in.). Weft: (selvage on left) 70cm (27 1/2in.).
Height of repeat: 52.5cm (20 1/2in.)
description: Twising columns with a trophy of flowers in the center. In three shades of red on white.

Textile, ca. 1780.
